Summary: reporting close encounter of the third kind
divs: Sighting Details Witnessed Ufos in sky near Sky Dancer Casino at4:00 am August 12. A later report that an object was landed and small humanoidbeings were observed outside the ship. Aliens descibed as being black. Scene wasleft by witness who went to the casino in a very frightend and agitated state toreport the event.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dunseith
There were no other sightings in Dunseith on or around August 12th 2001
